feed.title: Hosted Private Cloud Status - Incident History

entry.title: [RBX7][Hosted Private Cloud] - Network equipement operation
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Jun 14, 04:00 - 07:00 UTC

May 23, 09:57 UTC
Update - The current maintenance has been rescheduled.
Below you can find the new information regarding this operation:

Start time : 14/06/2023 04:00 UTC
End time : 14/06/2023 07:00 UTC
Service impact : Customers might experience twice of a few seconds of input/output freeze for storage equipment during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing an internal maintenance on a network equipment.

May 17, 01:44 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 24/05/2023 04:00 UTC
End time : 24/05/2023 07:00 UTC
Service impact : Customers might experience twice of a few seconds of input/output freeze for storage equipment during the maintenance.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our network infrastructure, we will be doing an internal maintenance on a network equipment.

entry.title: [RBX][Hosted Private Cloud] - Storage incident notification
entry.content:
May 24, 23:56 UTC
Identified - Start time: 24/05/2023 22:00 UTC
User impact :Due to difficulties encountered during operations on this ongoing: maintenace,
the back up on one of the concerned servers is temporary unavailable.
Root cause : Incident caused by difficulties encountered on this: maintenace
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on it to restore the service.

entry.title: [RBX2b][Hosted Private Cloud] - Storage cluster issue
entry.content:
May 24, 10:05 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 24/05/2023 07:34 UTC
End Time : 24/05/2023 09:45 UTC
Root cause : Incident due to a disconnection of network cards.

May 24, 08:21 UTC
Investigating - Please note the incident on Cluster117 PCC

Following all the necessary information.

Start time: 24/05/2023 07:34 UTC
User impact : The cluster117 is unavailable.
Affected assets :
ssd-016720
ssd-016692
ssd-016351
ssd-016615
ssd-016555
ssd-016577
ssd-016719
ssd-016384
ssd-017482
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : RBX2b
Ongoing Actions: Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

Thank you for your understanding

OVHcloud Technical team

entry.title: [RBX][Hosted Private Cloud] - Upgrade Storage Equipement
entry.content:
May 25, 00:16 UTC
Update - Due to difficulties that we encounter during the operations on this maintenance,
the back up on one of the concerned servers is temporary unvaialable. For more information please refer to this incident .

We will keep you informed when the operation is finished.
We apologize for this inconvenience.

entry.title: [RBX][Storage] - Cluster8353
entry.content:
May 15, 07:45 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 15/05/2023 06:30 UTC
End Time : 15/05/2023 07:05 UTC
Service impacted : The cluster8358 was unavailable.
Technical impact (DC/geographical area) : RBX2b
Root cause : Incident due to a software issue.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

entry.title: [BHS1A][Veeam Cloud Connect service] - Management plane
entry.content:
May 11, 18:10 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 09/05/2023 14:48 UTC
End time : 09/05/2023 18:01 UTC
Service status : The situation is back to normal, the service is running nominally.
Root cause : A hardware had a malfunction.

May 11, 15:36 UTC
Identified - The issue has been identified and a fix is being implemented.

May 11, 15:25 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 09/05/2023 14:48 UTC
Service impact : Veeam instance is unreachable. This will prevent any customer to make his backup via their Veeam Cloud Connect host in Beauharnois.
Ongoing actions : Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

entry.title: [Global][VMwarePrivateCloud] - vCenter major upgrade and and ESXi upgrade
entry.content:
May 2, 06:00 UTC
In progress - Scheduled maintenance is currently in progress. We will provide updates as necessary.

Apr 26, 21:59 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 02/05/2023 06:00 UTC
End time : 26/05/2023 16:00 UTC
Service impact : vSphere and Zerto will be inaccessible for 3 hours during the maintenance. Hosts will be rebooted, but there is no impact as the hosts are in maintenance mode.
Service improvement : As part of our continuous improvement policy of our infrastructure, we are rolling an upgrade for the VMware vCenter Server Appliance solution and ESXi for customers with and without Zerto service
